rem.description: Use as the base rem value for calculations.

aktiv.description: Use as primary sans serif across WPVIP applications

ivar.description: Use as primary text serif in long-form reading applications

recoleta.description: Use as primary brand display font in CMS marketing and the VIP Dashboard

aktiv-ex.description: Use as accent font in marketing and on wpvip.com

3.description: Use for small and medium sized headings.

5.description: Use for body-sized text in long-form reading applications.

inverse.description: Use as component background in high-contrast situations.
